definition: animal hide/leather/to reform/to remove/to expel (from office)
to attain/to reach/to amount to/to communicate/eminent
Tartar (various northern tribes in ancient China)/Tatar (Turkic ethnic group in central Asia)
Tartar (derogatory)/also used as an insulting term for Manchus around 1900
Strait of Tartary between Sakhalin and Russian mainland
expel the Manchu, revolutionary slogan from around 1900

sentences.english: Then we went on our usual amble up the block.
sentences.chinese: 接着我们像往常一样到街上蹓鞑。

sentences.english: What kind of quality control do you have?
sentences.chinese: 你们訚鞑么办法来控制质量妮？

sentences.english: Scratch a Russian and you will find a Tartar.
sentences.chinese: 从头开始俄罗斯，你会发现一个鞑。

definition: branch of the Xianbei 鮮卑|鲜卑 nomadic people, founders of Wei 北魏 of the Northern Dynasties (386-534)/also written 拓拔
prisoner of war/to capture/to take prisoner/(old) northern barbarian/slave
Bayan (name)/Bayan of the Baarin (1236-1295), Mongol Yuan general under Khubilai Khan, victorious over the Southern Song 1235-1239/Bayan of the Merkid (-1340), Yuan dynasty general and politician
branch of the Xianbei 鮮卑|鲜卑 nomadic people, founders of Wei 北魏 of the Northern Dynasties (386-534)/also written 拓跋
